mapper.select: SELECT A_NUM, CATEGORY, SUBJECT, TO_CHAR(INPUT_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') INPUT_DATE FROM ( SELECT A_NUM, CATEGORY, SUBJECT, INPUT_DATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY INPUT_DATE DESC ) R_NUM FROM ALARM WHERE ID=#{ id } AND READ_FLAG ='N') WHERE R_NUM BETWEEN 1 AND 3

SELECT a_num, category, subject, TO_CHAR(INPUT_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') input_date, read_flag FROM ( SELECT A_NUM, CATEGORY, SUBJECT, INPUT_DATE, READ_FLAG, ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY READ_FLAG, INPUT_DATE DESC ) R_NUM FROM ALARM WHERE ID=#{ id }) WHERE R_NUM BETWEEN #{ begin } AND #{ end }

SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM notice
subject LIKE '%'||#{ value }||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question(q_num, id, subject, category, content) values(q_code, #{ id }, #{ subject }, #{ category }, #{ content })
mapper.select: SELECT q_num, category, subject, answer_flag, TO_CHAR(INPUT_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') input_date FROM ( SELECT q_num, category, subject, answer_flag, input_date, ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY INPUT_DATE DESC ) R_NUM FROM question WHERE ID=#{ id }) WHERE R_NUM BETWEEN #{ begin } AND #{ end }
SELECT subject, category, TO_CHAR(input_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') input_date, answer_flag, content, answer_content, TO_CHAR(answer_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') answer_date FROM question WHERE q_num=#{ q_num }
